item.title: Pablo Reports: Over 100 priests arrested in Minneapolis for protesting ICE in Minnesota where today it was -21 degrees outside MSP Airport.
item.description: The clergy gathered in prayerful solidarity to demand airlines — especially Delta and Signature Aviation — cease contracting deportation flights to DHS. So far, over 2,000 deportations have gone through MSP, per organizers.

26 Imgur Creator Spotlight: @ExposedBookworm did this painting. Go give their stuff an updoot.
Man Tax: Lucky Blue Smith
“Alone he rides, alone, The fair and fatal king: Dark night is all his own, That strange and solemn thing.” - Lionel Johnson So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! Here's the new one https://discord.gg/NPStJGgARq - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Unable to work, zero income. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've honestly been my lifeline. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me

item.title: The Idiots of Imgur: A Mini Dump pt 242
item.description: Some of you have been wondering where the idiot posts have been the last couple weeks. The truth is that I simply didn’t have enough content to fill up a mini dump those weeks. These posts always featured content that’s posted on Imgur and recommended by other Imgurians, and to change that by getting outside content just doesn’t feel right. The posts may become slightly more irregular but I’m still here and still taking suggestions! As always, have a great weekend!

item.title: More Blatant Republican Hypocrisy
item.description: https://cdllife.com/2026/doj-will-no-longer-pursue-criminal-charges-for-diesel-deletes-and-tunes/ “Today, the Justice Department is exercising its enforcement discretion to no longer pursue criminal charges under the Clean Air Act based on allegations of tampering with onboard diagnostic devices in motor vehicles.“ Officials say that civil penalties could still be issued: “DOJ is committed to sound enforcement principles, efficient use of government resources, and avoiding over-criminalization of federal environmental law. In partnership with the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), DOJ will still pursue civil enforcement for these violations when appropriate.“ So, the DoJ has asserted that they will only pursue civil penalties, not criminal ones, for breaking the law and damaging the environment. But immigration? Something that only carries civil penalties to begin with? That is to be met with a militarized Gestapo force firing guns and chemical weapons? Don't ever let MAGA tell you that the "law" is some absolute thing...

item.title: Call it what it is…not just a look
item.description: What a loser. This guy is not even good enough to be called trash. Imagine how insecure this narcissist is. Most people look back on their lives and think, ‘Did I make a positive impact?’, ‘Was I a good person?’, ‘Did I do what was right?’…in the end, all people know, even narcissists, that their legacy impinges on these questions and many know that, despite the rhetoric, they were horrible people and history will always remember it that way. This is why these types surround themselves with like-minded individuals because they can justify their actions and feel comfortable doing so. Once outside of their inner circle, reality hits…no one likes you, your actions, your mentality, and your presence. We will overcome…

These are species that are considered difficult by many to tell apart.
O A T
I mean, I am, because the way my mind works is that when nice and good things happen to me, the universe will IMMEDIATELY take them back in horrific and trauma-inducing ways, because that's how my history has been, but you do you, boo.
Pippin tax Today's message from Pippin: "Glory Pippin. Good morning." ______ 1) Are you on the run to a safe place and passing through Arizona on your way to safer grounds? My apartment is open to you to crash at, and it is a safe space. Pippin and I will make you a meal and gladly share tea, wine, or mead with you. 2) Hey! Take your meds with a full glass of water, please. Do it for Pippin, or Space Mom, or better yet, do it for yourself. 3) Ĝefeloað wē. We will carry on. 4) all funds from the sales of items at these two links will be sent to support charities aiding to fight for Trans rights in the US (not just T-shirts!) https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74812801-all-conures-are-anarchists https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74811778-whiptail-pride 5) Since multiple people have requested this over the last two weeks or so, my ko-fi is: https://ko-fi.com/codyandpippin

item.title: ICE/Border Patrol agents are now hitting unaccompanied minors with their vehicles, detaining and disappearing them, even after being shown a U.S. passport.
item.description: Yesterday, agents rear-ended a car being driven by a 16-year-old, with her 15-year-old brother in the passenger seat. Instead of calling a guardian, agents photographed the 15-year-old… and then took him. The 16-year-old showed agents her U.S. passport…. But, that did not matter, they still handcuffed her and threw her into their unmarked car. Both minors. Both unaccompanied. Detaining children, ignoring proof of citizenship, and hauling minors away, after rear ending the car they were driving, is not immigration enforcement. That is child trafficking. And it’s happening in broad daylight by the Trump administration. Share this. Document everything. Demand accountability. Because if federal agents can do this to kids with a passport, no one is safe. https://x.com/TheJFreakinC/status/2014370271336034805?t=rH2hwlGD3O0-wjvLicvcbA&s=19
item.dc:creator: d14z3p4m
